Class SwimInSchoolData

Namespace
ECCLibrary.Data
Assembly
ECCLibrary.dll

Contains data pertaining to adding the SwimInSchool CreatureAction.

Each schooling creature chooses a single "leader" larger than itself (and of the same TechType) to follow. Therefore, the SizeDistribution property should be defined for this action to function properly.

public class SwimInSchoolData

Constructors

SwimInSchoolData(float, float, float, float, float, float, float)

Contains data pertaining to adding the SwimInSchool CreatureAction.

Each schooling creature chooses a single "leader" larger than itself (and of the same TechType) to follow. Therefore, the SizeDistribution property should be defined for this action to function properly.

public SwimInSchoolData(float evaluatePriority, float swimVelocity, float schoolSize, float swimInterval, float percentFindLeaderRespond = 0.5, float chanceLoseLeader = 0.1, float breakDistance = 20)

Parameters

evaluatePriority float

The priority for this CreatureAction, expected to be in the range [0, 1].

swimVelocity float

Swim speed for this action (m/s). Should match speed defined in the SwimRandomData. Typically 2-3 m/s for small fish, 4-8 m/s for medium fish and sharks, and 15-20 m/s for aggressive leviathans.

schoolSize float

Maximum distance this fish will swim away from its "leader". Default value is 2 meters.

swimInterval float

Number of seconds between each time the creature repositions itself. Default value is 1 second.

percentFindLeaderRespond float

Value with expected range of [0.0, 1.0]. Default value is 0.5f.

Every 2 seconds, a schooling creature checks if it should begin schooling. This value determines the chance of forming a school. A value of 0f means it will never school, while 1f means it always will attempt.

chanceLoseLeader float

///

Value with expected range of [0.0, 1.0]. Default value is 0.1f.

Every 2 seconds, a schooling creature checks if it should stop schooling. This value determines the chance of breaking off. A value of 0f means it will never break off, while 1f disables the behaviour.

breakDistance float

If the creature leaves this radius (in meters) of its leader, it will stop following. Default value is 20 meters.

Fields

breakDistance

If the creature leaves this radius (in meters) of its leader, it will stop following. Default value is 20 meters.
